page.title: 15 POLITICS
page.content: Mr Jeff Rooker has been our local Member of Parliament since February 1974. He was then 33 years old. His majority was 2023 but in the election of 1983 he had increased this to 7402. He is a member of the Labour Party. Local people consider him to be a very good constituency M.P. and feel confident that he will help them in any way he can. He told us in a letter that many enquiries are made about housing applications, transfers and repairs. Numerous requests for help with Social Security problems such as pensions and housing benefit are also received. Frequent enquiries are made about planning and environmental matters such as improvement grants and refuse collection. Mr Rooker also deals with many immigration problems for his constituents.
